response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards, and its value to you is estimated at $1,200,000. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to ensuring that you receive a value that exceeds your expectations while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We believe this price aligns well with the market value and the significant benefits this product provides. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 950000}
